gist.summary: A fresh frontend redesign introduces a unified header with user controls, an always-visible AI theme bar, and native support for audio generation models.
gist.impact: Users will enjoy a more polished interface with easier account management and new creative possibilities for audio generation.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee acting as a UI designer, placing new header blocks and wearing headphones to represent the audio support. The scene represents the 'polishing' and 'redesign' aspect.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee wearing headphones and polishing a giant pixelated interface block. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley meets a design studio. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
